alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 02 at 8:36AM PST until December 03 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 36 expected. * WHERE...Eastern Santa Clara Hills. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
